website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you are looking for a very inexpensive brow gel. Blonde color is very natural. However, the applicator brush and wear could be better.
pros: Comes in colors that look natural on most wearers
Customers rave about how natural the blonde shade looks, even against pale skin and light hair
cons: Brush design makes it awkward to use, and too much product comes out on the brush
Tends to flake off throughout the day

customer_reviews.title: Best blonde brow makeup that I have ever tried.
customer_reviews.text: Finally! A blonde brow shaper that isn't too dark or too light. My only wish is that the brush was a little narrower for more control. It applies easily and doesn't dry out skin or give brows a stiff feel. They remain soft yet in control. I would call the color light ash blonde. It's light enough not to look garish, yet dark enough to give some definition to your brows. I love Benefit's Gimme Brow. The brush is great, but the lightest shade is still too dark for me. This color (Rimmel Brow This Way, Blonde) is better for me and more natural looking.
customer_reviews.author: Glamazon23

customer_reviews.title: Fake product, buyers beware
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know there were fake versions of drugstore cosmetics, but what I received definitely was. The labeling on the packaging was all the wrong colors. It looked like someone glued it together and when I opened the brow mascara, clear liquid poured out....I don't know anyone who has had any kind of mascara have liquid pour out. I tried shaking it up, and thin brown liquid poured out. Gross. I've used the real version of this brow mascara before and have been super happy with it. Even more so than the expensive Sephora versions. This was a huge disappointment since I can't find this one in stores anymore. I just threw it away. Buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: It was just okay.
customer_reviews.text: If you're super fair and have bright blue veins, this will probably still contain too much red undertone for you to look natural. It's also way darker than I thought. I'm a brunette with super fair skin and it's very hard to match. This isn't the most natural of products for fair skin. If I do wear it I make sure to apply my foundation first over my brows to match my skin tone better. I do NOT use the spool it comes on because it would look far too caked on. I just an angled brush and paint it on that way.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernGirl123

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for blondes
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brow gel. It amps up your brows without being overly complicated to apply. I'm not great with applying pencils and prefer this gel with the wand applicator. When you first get it its a bit heavy so you may have to wipe the wand, but after a few uses the consistency is perfect. I swipe it on in the morning and it lasts through the day and is very natural. Plus so cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Kojo C.

customer_reviews.title: Nope, didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after a YouTube beauty guru raved about it. It did not work for me. First, the wand is too big for the eyebrows, second, it's goopy and makes a mess and third, it doesn't hold the brows in place. For about the same price the elf give me brow works so much better. Would not repurchase
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Actually "blonde"! Takes 10 sec to apply. Stays on. Not glumpy. Easy. Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great. Easy to use. Takes 10 seconds. The blonde is actually blonde! So hard to find an actual blonde match even though brands say "blonde". This is easy, quick, matches, not glumpy, stays on, the price is so nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blonde shade too dark for me.
customer_reviews.text: I found the blonde shade much too dark for my med-dark blonde brows and would say it’s nearer to a mid-brown and is only a light hold. The spoolie picked up too much product and was a little unwieldy. After some practice, I’m able to use it but it definitely takes a light touch and wiping the spoolie first helps (but wastes product). Longevity is great but means if you get out of bounds with the product you’re going to be removing your base trying to clean up your edges.
customer_reviews.author: SlyFlowerMom

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected surprise!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this brow gel. I bought it because I needed something in a hurry but expected that it wouldn't be so great because of the low cost but I'm happy to see it works really well and I will definitely be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Perry

customer_reviews.title: This stuff made me look like Groucho Marx ..
customer_reviews.text: The main problem with this brow product is the color. I ordered medium brown but it looks auburn . It stands out against my dark brows and doesn't blend in at all. Too much product comes out on the wand making it hard to apply a small , even amount . The formula is clumpy and thick. This stuff is awful , it made look like Groucho Marx . I can't find one good thing about it. You can get much nicer brow products for $4.50.
customer_reviews.author: C. WallaceTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: A Keeper!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many eyebrow gels with such disappointment. This "reasonable" one is better than all higher price ones. It coats your eyebrows and the color is just right. I used dark brown. Stays on until you wash it off. Does not smudge onto skin.
customer_reviews.author: Annie H.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as Glossier Boy Brow - but for the price it's good. The brush is bigger than I usually like and when you pull it out of the tube there is a TON of product on the brush. I would recommend scraping most of it off if you want a more natural eyebrow look.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for blondes who are having trouble finding a color that doesn’t make their brows too dark or fake looking! Small spool brush is perfect for application. A great product at a fraction of my other favorite from Benefit
customer_reviews.author: michelleh

customer_reviews.title: Brush too big, product too sloppy
customer_reviews.text: Recently received Browgal tinted brow gel in a sample box and LOVE it. Rimmel - your product doesn’t come close. I even tried using my Browgal brush with the Rimmel, but product still came out in sloppy clumps.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Certainly it’s a brow gel, but the color is WAY too much. If you want an extremely noticeable brow this will do, but really just seems way more pigmented than necessary. Kinda looks like you have paint underneath your brow hairs.
customer_reviews.author: MomoMalady

customer_reviews.title: Color is lighter
customer_reviews.text: The product is described as medium brown and the color sample is illustrated as a medium brown...yet I think that this is actually a light brown when applied. I can't use it. I need a darker color.
customer_reviews.author: ceccam30

customer_reviews.title: Kind of watery
customer_reviews.text: The color is accurate it works for me. But it’s a little thin and watery so it’s kind of messy and it feels wet on my eyebrows for a while until they dry. It doesn’t seem to last on there very long either.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: Short thick brush is great for application. My natural eyebrows are so light you almost can't see them. 001 blonde blonde was the perfect color for me.
customer_reviews.author: atyk2018

customer_reviews.title: ... first try at gel brow tint and I really like how it makes my super light eyebrows actually have ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first try at gel brow tint and I really like how it makes my super light eyebrows actually have some color and definition. However, the brush holds A LOT of gel and you have to be careful to avoid it being too heavy when you apply it. I have to wipe off a lot of excess from the brush before applying it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Klemm

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great product. It lightened my brows to match my ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great product. It lightened my brows to match my blonde wig pretty well. It's a little thicker and cakes a bit more than I'd like, but over all looks and works pretty well. I think a smaller applicator might be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to use. Adds color and wears well. And it is not expensive. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Buy Wunderbrow instead. You're welcome.
customer_reviews.text: Stiff and unpleasant feeling on brows and did not last. Just say no to this one and splurge on Wunderbrow. You're worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Studioguysgirl

customer_reviews.title: Made thin eyebrows look normal
customer_reviews.text: Review by Mrs. Bruce T. I applied, let dry, then used eyebrow brush (soft baby toothbrush). Now you can see the outside of my brows where the hairs are thin and perhaps fading in color.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce T.

customer_reviews.title: Another sucky rimmel product.  It is cheap for a reason.
customer_reviews.text: The applicator is of poor quality so when makeup applies it goops on your eyebrow causing necessary cleanup which gets the product on your skin. Product also flaked off during the day. Maybellines' version has much better application.
customer_reviews.author: M. JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: This brow gel does a very good job and so much more natural looking than a ...
customer_reviews.text: This brow gel does a very good job and so much more natural looking than a brow pencil. I won't be buying any more pencils but will definitely purchase product again.
customer_reviews.author: skyequeen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I apply this brow mascara daily to cover grey brow hairs that are starting to show . I used to dye my brows before but found this mascara less harsh and it give me an even beautiful color. It's very natural and last all day without retouching.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Best for brows!
customer_reviews.text: Oh Em Gee! This stuff is absolutely the best! Ive always had darker brows for being a blonde but they're thin. This fills in so perfectly without looking fake or over done! I will never go back to a pencil or dye after using this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: This is gross. The formula is so thick that it comes out in chunks on the wand. It's like putting brown glue on your eyebrows.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Daniels

customer_reviews.title: The spoolie is too long
customer_reviews.text: The color is as I expected but the wand is too long for me to use on my (I guess too thin?) eyebrows. Makes it hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: texascutie

customer_reviews.title: Good value product. Best in class
customer_reviews.text: Believable color and easy to apply. Almost as good as Blinc brand which is 4 times the price, except for the staying power. Use a light hand. There is a learning curve.
customer_reviews.author: gigglybritches

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been using this product for years and will continue to use itGreat product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for years and will continue to use it
customer_reviews.author: Michele A. Juliano

customer_reviews.title: Seems bottom of the shelf
customer_reviews.text: Hard to apply only a little bit, always goes on too thick and has to dry. Rubs off easy.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this brow product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Easy to use but use a little bit or your brows will look too dark.
customer_reviews.author: Tanny G

customer_reviews.title: Great for blondes.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite brow gel if you have blonde hair this is the perfect color for youm
customer_reviews.author: Lena Herman

customer_reviews.title: ok product
customer_reviews.text: but the bursh is a little fat and the color was too dark for me (red-head, fair complextion)
customer_reviews.author: mom of 3 teenage girls!

customer_reviews.title: Flakes off
customer_reviews.text: Goes on ok but tends to flake off. Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Pediatric Therapist

customer_reviews.title: Great eye brows!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Goes on easy and looks natural. Good price, too.,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t clump
customer_reviews.text: I love how this product shapes and defines the Brows.
customer_reviews.author: Francesco Pavano

customer_reviews.title: Great shade for blondes
customer_reviews.text: Love this brow gel! I have naturally light blonde hair which makes it hard to find a good color for my brows that is not too dark. This shade works perfectly for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Rimmel Brow This Way, Lightweight Eyebrow
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, makes me look great as I have little white eyebrows, and provides me with color I need
customer_reviews.author: NormaRae

customer_reviews.title: Like very much
customer_reviews.text: My brows are very sparse but this product help them look much better.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I hated this brow gel :(. The wand for the product is too large, and the product is too thick!
customer_reviews.author: Shelbi Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great blonde color and quality
customer_reviews.text: Best "blonde" brow gel out there! Not too dark for blondes! Not red or gray either. Just perfect color and stays Onn all day!
customer_reviews.author: Gail O.

customer_reviews.title: Total Mess
customer_reviews.text: I foolishly thought I might have found a cheaper replacement for my Glossier boybrow. No. No. No. The wand is HUGE and the formula is way too thick. I threw it directly in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have very "sparse" eyebrows due to over-plucking as a teenager. The gel fills in nicely and looks natural when dry. It is a little difficult to get the hang of it, but once you do it's great. The blond goes on very light but dries to just the right color for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cynzia

customer_reviews.title: skip it
customer_reviews.text: i used it because my brows were too dark. does an okay job coloring the brows but does not last very long maybe only a couple of hours
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is.  Serves a purpose.  Nothing special.
customer_reviews.text: This is like mascara for your eyebrows. It does not fill in scarcity, only colors and shapes. It washes off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very watery
customer_reviews.text: Very watery, grey-ish color. Not a fan. Quickly tossed, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Skye Alisha Pratt

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! I was looking for a brow product like this one, because i already have nice eyebrows and I just needed a little tinted gel. lasts all day!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Santana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Halloween makeup (Barbie) or if you dye your ...
customer_reviews.text: Completely covered my dark eyebrows and made them look blonde. Perfect for Halloween makeup (Barbie) or if you dye your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Mariaaa

customer_reviews.title: Maybe good for thicker brows?
customer_reviews.text: Do you enjoy blotting your eyebrows? This is the product for you! Overly large applicator and the tendency to clump makes this just OK for those of us with naturally sparse brows.
customer_reviews.author: Beth McMurphy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the eyebrows in shape.
customer_reviews.text: Lighter than expected but will be fine for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Ishoponline

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially for novice eyebrow groomers like myself
customer_reviews.text: Great product, especially for novice eyebrow groomers like myself. Easy to use and adds eyebrow beauty without looking like a clown.
customer_reviews.author: PAULA

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Works great. Very easy to apply. Stays put all day. Looks natural. Definitely will be a regular purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kris T

customer_reviews.title: Good, cheap product for a sculptured eye brow look!
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day and it washes off easily.
customer_reviews.author: CassieDSm

customer_reviews.title: but really good product!
customer_reviews.text: It was darker than I was hoping, but really good product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great eyebrow gel
customer_reviews.text: My eyebrows are thinning and I wanted something to fill them in and look natural. This does the job for me. Good price and very fast delivery. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: westlake mom

customer_reviews.title: Meh. It's okay
customer_reviews.text: You definitely have to scrape a lot off of the brush before you use it
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great price/product.
customer_reviews.text: It works well. Color is perfect. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Every bit as good as the benefit eyebrow shaper I used to buy for a fraction of the price!
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the color I expected, thick formula but I mix with my clear brow gel and it works okay
customer_reviews.author: ElsaCee

customer_reviews.title: Horrible brush
customer_reviews.text: The brush is horrible! The only good thing about this is that the color stays on for a while
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't happy with the color, it came out with a dark gray undertone no thank you
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Kirk

customer_reviews.title: GLOPPY.. not a good look for your brows
customer_reviews.text: Meh! I wanted to like this product because in general, I LOVE brow gels! It comes out inconsistently and goes onto your brows very gloppy. I have never applied this without having to do some cleanup with a wet q-tip afterwards. This one will save you some money over the pricier competitors (like Smash Box or Anastasia, but is it worth it?
customer_reviews.author: Grace Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use! Gives your eyebrows that extra umpf ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Maree McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Looks too fake
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to use but looks very fake. I have Brown hair and chose medium brown brow gel but it's still way too dark.
customer_reviews.author: Stay at Home Mama!

customer_reviews.title: The applicator brush is long and thick, so no ...
customer_reviews.text: The applicator brush is long and thick, so no matter how careful I was, I always ended up with gel somewhere above or below my brow. The product itself did the trick, but application got messy.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Nicole

customer_reviews.title: it's not great, but it's good enough to wear during the ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this is okay to use, it's not great, but it's good enough to wear during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Ha

customer_reviews.title: A Keeper!
customer_reviews.text: Would definitely recommend. I have very blonde eyebrows and this shade is perfect. It's not too dark and not too light. Is very easy to apply and doesn't cake on as others I have tried did. I only apply once in the morning and lasts all day. No adverse reaction at all to product. I will continue to use and would highly recommend for others with coloring like me whose brows appear washed away.
customer_reviews.author: jnix

customer_reviews.title: Ash Blonde Color not too warm, great product could have a better applicator
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. The brush goes on a little gloopy but you just have to blend it a bit. One of the other reviewers said that the blonde was really for setting and didn't offer much color. I totally disagree, I have blonde eyebrows, like really blonde, and this is a pretty generous amount of definition/color for me. Its a good color not too read which is normally my issue, more of an ash blonde. I swipe this on instead of pencil and then blend with a q-tip.
customer_reviews.author: KNS

customer_reviews.title: Runny formula, and with a too-big brush, it gets everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to hope I got a bad one, but this product is impossible to use. The brush is too big, and the formula is so runny, it gets everywhere. My brows take three times as long to do because I'm cleaning drippy brow gel from my face. The color is nice, so I wish I could use it, but after a couple of tries, it became clear that there was no way.I had high hopes for finding a less expensive brow gel, but this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all Day
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I was tired of spending a fortune on brow products and I actually like it. I will recommend wiping off the excess product, or else it can be too thick but once you do that it works real nicely. The color is also nice, not red toned like others I have tried. Worth the money. It holds well and lasts all day. I have dry skin so most products do last on me so I can't be sure on oily skin, but for dry skin it is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: S&J Lawson

customer_reviews.title: The best brow gel I’ve tried!
customer_reviews.text: I have fine, blonde, invisible eyebrows. I dye them AND use brow gel to get them to look good. I used to have to use mascara until thicker more natural brows came into style. This is the only tinted brow gel I like; it doesn’t clump, or smudge too badly, and it goes on thickly enough that it does actually show. I live in a dry climate with 4 seasons. The trick is to apply it with short, light strokes using mostly the tip of the applicator. Cons: not many colors, easy to mess up.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Great brow style gel
customer_reviews.text: Like this Rommel Brow brow style gel. It is not like others only canbe used for maybe 10 times then you have to throw it away for nothing coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Y Liu

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great product for when you want to define your brows but not draw them on. Very natural look. It works quick and effectively and lasts all day. It’s not as heavy as other brow gel products that last for days and don’t come off even with turpentine lol. My only complaint is that it does nothing that a gel does, meaning it doesn’t take your brows in place it merely tints them.
customer_reviews.author: Majda Khokhar

customer_reviews.title: Good item!
customer_reviews.text: I like it! Very good price, love the amazon delivery. I am blonde, but have darker eyebrows. Even so, this is still a touch too dark in my opinion, so if you're very fair it won't be the right fit. If you have light brown hair this might be perfect for you! It is easy to apply and works all day. I probably will buy it again and just try to put it on very lightly
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mayer

customer_reviews.title: So far I am not disappointed! It’s a lot less time consuming than the ...
customer_reviews.text: For years I did not apply makeup to my brows. About a year ago I changed my eyebrows completely and started using a brow pencil with a spoolie. I decided I wanted something that was quick to apply and this was the first thing I came across at a decent price. So far I am not disappointed! It’s a lot less time consuming than the brow pencil but it looks almost exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable quality for its price
customer_reviews.text: This eyebrow gel is not as good as the Japanese brand I had before, the color is not as pigmented(it’s lighter when you apply it and turns darker after it dries) and the drying time is slower, also it’s easier to come off, but consider its price and volume the quality is acceptable if you are on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnycube

customer_reviews.title: Not light blonde.
customer_reviews.text: What was listed as light blonde, even the tube is blonde but the liquid is darker than I expected. Won't work with my hair nor skin color. Somewhere on this site is a simple light blonde eyebrow makeup that lives up to it's title. :(
customer_reviews.author: KeepingFaith

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I love this brow gel! I prefer it to many of the more expensive brands. It provides a natural tint to your brows, while simultaneously holding your brows in place. I use a cheap pencil first, to fill in, and then finish it up with a thin layer of this. This is always part of my daily routine!
customer_reviews.author: SamC

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried numerous different eyebrow pencils, powders, you name it. I love getting my eyebrows tinted but hate having to take the time to go get them done. This stuff looks as though I’ve gotten them done at the salon. The color is great, it is easy to apply, easy to clean up around the edges, doesn’t smear and stays on forever! Couldn’t be happier. This is definitely my new fav for the brows and would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Watery and with odd chunks.
customer_reviews.text: Super watery and chunky at the same time. Even attempting to wipe a bunch off on the side of the container still just made it so watery still with strange chunks in it. But the Ulta brand one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well if some of it is wiped off the applicator first to avoid going on too thick. I have difficulty finding a brow product in a light enough blonde color and one that doesn't have red/brown tones. Color-wise, this is one of the best I've found.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Warm toned
customer_reviews.text: It's warm toned. If you have cool toned ashy brows this will be too warm/reddish for you.
customer_reviews.author: L R Monroe

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT COLOR AND PRICE
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product and far less expensive than Loreal or other brands and works beautifully. Color is great for Blonds. Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Sowers

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because I have to scrape off the wand into the tube before using it because way too much sticks onto the wand BUT I love the end result
customer_reviews.author: BRC

customer_reviews.title: The only reason I'm giving this 4 stars is because ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm giving this 4 stars is because it is a little lighter for a dark brown. It goes light but it darkens as it dries. I use a powder underneath so it doesn't look light once it dries.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Hmm...I have mixed feelings about this product. The wand is too big and the formula is clumpy. However, it keeps my brows in place and looks nice if you dont mess it up.
customer_reviews.author: That person

customer_reviews.title: It makes a huge mess.
customer_reviews.text: This is way too wet. I will probably end up throwing most of it away.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: very liquid and light
customer_reviews.text: Very liquid and the color does not appear clearly I do not recommend it very bad
customer_reviews.author: wafaa

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Compares well to Mary Kay. Long lasting. Half the price of other more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee

customer_reviews.title: Blonde eyebrow color
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the color I had hoped it would be, not too dark. It is thick and goes on, and stays on nicely. Would buy it again. Nice price too.
customer_reviews.author: Raerae

customer_reviews.title: its not medium brown at all, can't use it
customer_reviews.text: it may be a good product, no use for it, not the color as described when I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. R

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this at all. Does not stay on skin and looks horrible. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Product is so clumpy and runny that it globs on your brow hairs. Total fail.
customer_reviews.author: Kim F

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this.....
customer_reviews.text: This is junk. Brush was waaaay too big for eyebrows and it was super clumpy. Spend the extra money and get a nicer one
customer_reviews.author: Pamski

customer_reviews.title: great product and a perfect color
customer_reviews.text: great product and a perfect color. I'm fair skinned with reddish hair and it gives my brows the right amount of color
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Clumps and stains and generally just plain bad ! :(
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works great - got wrong color. I needed dark brown.
customer_reviews.author: Tatianna

customer_reviews.title: not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: goopy, not cute, bad applicator that's WAY TO BIG, I always made a mess on my face. not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Looks red
customer_reviews.text: The color is terrible, it’s a red rusty color, not good for my skin tone and way too dark. Nothing like the Benefit brand one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Rimmel Brow This Way Lightweight Gel, Blonde, 0.17 Fluid Ounce
product_meta.description: Size:1 Count| Color:BlondeStyle your brows into the perfect shape.
feature_bullets: SHAPE AND DEFINE WITH BROW MASCARA: For stay in place brows that are glossier and more defined than the average eyebrow, swipe on Rimmel Brow This Way. Keeps those eyebrows on fleek whether you're grabbing a drink with the girls or dancing with the boys.

FOR BROWS THAT LOOK NATURALLY PERFECT: Turn to Rimmel Brow This Way Lightweight Eyebrow Gel for perfectly groomed eyebrows in an easy, smooth application. Comfortable lightweight-texture formula defines, fills and fixes brow all day with a tint of shine

BE YOU Rimmel Lash Accelerator is the perfect way to accentuate what makes you, you. Try with our full line of Rimmel products, including foundation, concealer, eyeliner, contouring kits, eye shadow, bronzer, lipstick, lip gloss, blush, & highlighter.

TRUE TO YOU What started with the first non-toxic mascara has lead to more than a century of legacy, leadership and innovation in affordable makeup, beauty products, and tools. At Rimmel, we’re not here to define your look. We innovate to take you there

RIMMEL QUALITY--Compare Rimmel quality beauty products with brands like L'Oréal, Maybelline, Revlon, NYX, e.l.f., Almay, Prestige, Julep, Lush, Milani, Clinique, MAC, Sonia Kashuk, Neutrogena, Physician's Formula, Elizabeth Mott, Sephora, and bareMinerals.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
